name: part_006
file: tmp_【新3Dお披露目】周防パトラ生誕祭！ゲスト FUWAMOCO＆豪華ビデオレター！重大告知あり！Birthday Party 2025【周防パトラ】 [bubs05N-m04]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Sakuranbo' with guests Fuwa and Moco Abyssgard.
MC section where Suuo Patra thanks the audience for the birthday celebration.
Performance of the song 'The Great Devil is actually the Archangel Patra-chan-sama!'.
scenes.song_name: The Great Devil is actually the Archangel Patra-chan-sama!

subtitles.original: キュンキュン！
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun!

subtitles.original: ワンワン！
subtitles.english: Bow wow!

subtitles.original: みんな！ 周防パトラ生誕祭、盛り上げてくれてどうもありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you so much for livening up the Suou Patra Birthday Party!

subtitles.original: まだまだ歌っちゃうから、盛り上げよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'm going to keep singing, so please keep the energy up!

subtitles.original: 偉大なる悪魔は実は大天使パトラちゃん様なのだー！
subtitles.english: The Great Devil is actually the Archangel Patra-chan-sama!

subtitles.original: びっくびっくびっくびっくお邪魔様
subtitles.english: Ex-ex-ex-excuse me

subtitles.original: いっぱい食べて褒めて甘やかしてよ
subtitles.english: Eat a lot, praise me, and spoil me

subtitles.original: 転んでひゅうと泣かせないで
subtitles.english: Don't fall and make me cry

subtitles.original: 戦わないモンスターに負けないで
subtitles.english: Don't lose to monsters that don't fight

subtitles.original: ひるの運命は自分で切り開け
subtitles.english: Carve out your own destiny during the day

subtitles.original: バカというほうがバカ
subtitles.english: The one who calls others an idiot is the idiot

subtitles.original: 超セクシーでキュートで断然プリティーが基本です
subtitles.english: Super sexy, cute, and definitely pretty is the basics

subtitles.original: 文化的最低限のボニボニ It's my life
subtitles.english: Culturally minimum boniboni, it's my life

subtitles.original: むにむにむにむに頬むにょ
subtitles.english: Squishy squishy squishy squishy, squishy cheeks

subtitles.original: むにむにむにむに頬むにょ
subtitles.english: Squishy squishy squishy squishy, squishy cheeks

subtitles.original: そもそもこんなに可愛いのに いつから悪魔と錯覚していた？
subtitles.english: In the first place, I'm this cute, since when did you have the illusion that I'm a devil?

subtitles.original: そうだそうだ！ 誤解およしな天使のような女の子
subtitles.english: That's right, that's right! Stop the misunderstanding, I'm an angel-like girl

subtitles.original: 右に迷ったんじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not that I got lost to the right

subtitles.original: 地球が逆回転したんじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not that the Earth spun backwards

subtitles.original: いつ、いづ、いづも、いつでもバトっていづも主役！
subtitles.english: Always, always, always, always battling, I'm always the protagonist!

subtitles.original: はぁー、なんだか疲れちゃった
subtitles.english: Sigh, I'm kind of tired

subtitles.original: 時代が追いつくまで待とうかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll wait until the era catches up

subtitles.original: 今日も誕生日！
subtitles.english: Today is also my birthday!
